analysis.description:
GuneToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#98) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#211-227)

GuneToken.HARD_CAP_T should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#102-103)
GuneToken.SOFT_CAP_T should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#105)
GuneToken.initialSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#100-101)
GuneToken.startDate should be constant (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#98)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x04da1cd6498986015f700397a8b4bfbaa70c9399.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
